pull.title: kernel:  add serialization method for btck_BlockHeader API
pull.body:
This adds serialization for `btck_BlockHeader` API. Also, updated the `CheckHandle` to compare the byte content instead of size.

Follow-up to #33822 .

comments.body: I think as a defensive mechanism, we should still use try-catch here to ensure exceptions never cross the C API boundary, even though header serialization shouldn't fail under normal circumstances.
